Methods

(inner) addLibrary(webgmeToken, parameters, callback)

parameters.blobHash or parameters.libraryInfo must be given.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
webgmeToken string
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
projectId string
branchName string
libraryName string
blobHash string <optional>
 Add from an uploaded file.
libraryInfo object <optional>
 Add from an existing project.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
projectId string <optional>
 if libraryInfo, projectId must be given.
branchName string <optional>
 if libraryInfo and not commitHash, it must be given.
commitHash string <optional>
 if libraryInfo and not branchName, it must be given.
callback function

Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
commitHash string State of project to check.

 'META' 'META', 'CUSTOM' or 'BOTH'.

(inner) executePlugin(webgmeToken, socketIdopt, pluginName, callback)

Executes a plugin.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
webgmeToken string
socketId string <optional>
 Id of socket that send the request (used for notifications).
pluginName string
context.managerConfig object where the plugin should execute.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
project string id of project.
activeNode string path to activeNode.
activeSelection string <optional>
 [] paths to selected nodes.
commitHash string <optional>
 commit hash to start the plugin from (if falsy will use HEAD of branchName)
branchName string <optional>
 branch which to save to.
context.namespace string <optional>
 '' used namespace during execution ('' represents all namespaces).
context.pluginConfig object <optional>
 %defaultForPlugin% specific configuration for the plugin.
callback function
Source:
  • src/server/worker/workerrequests.js, line 124

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
webgmeToken string
projectName string Name of new project.
ownerId string <optional>
 Owner of new project, if not given falls back to user associated with the token.
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
seedName string Name of seed, file or projectId.
type string 'db' or 'file'
seedBranch string <optional>
 'master' If db - optional name of branch.
seedCommit string <optional>
 If db - optional commit-hash to seed from (if given branchName will not be used).
function} callback

(inner) updateLibrary(webgmeToken, parameters, callback)

If blobHash nor libraryInfo is given, will attempt to "refresh" library based on the libraryInfo stored at the library node.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
webgmeToken string
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
projectId string
branchName string
libraryName string
blobHash string <optional>
 Update from an uploaded file.
libraryInfo object <optional>
 Update from an existing project.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
projectId string <optional>
 if libraryInfo, projectId must be given.
branchName string <optional>
 if libraryInfo and not commitHash, it must be given.
commitHash string <optional>
 if libraryInfo and not branchName, it must be given.
callback function
